availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William David Poindexter (Scott County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of David and Elizabeth Poindexter. Married to Martha Lucas Poindexter in Scott County, Kentucky, on March 9, 1848. Father of Lorenzo Poindexter. Tanner in Scott County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Scott County in 1860. Household owned seventeen enslaved persons in Scott County in 1860. Merchant in Scott County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 2, p. 477B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, p. 915.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, p. 218A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Scott County, KY, July 1863, p. 14.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994054, Scott County Deaths.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Scott County Marriages, Film 000183225.
"William David Poindexter (1827-1915)," Find A Grave, Memorial 114366208, accessed June 15, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/114366208.
